snippet.title: Alaskan Truck Simulator | Gameplay Trailer | Future Games Show June 2022
snippet.description:
Enjoy this brand-new gameplay trailer from Alaskan Truck Simulator.
First debuted at the Future Games Show in June 2022.
We’re pleased to announce that a demo for Alaskan Truck Simulator is out now, and the game is coming to PC and consoles in Q4 2022.

Our Socials - YouTube: www.youtube.com/GamesRadar
Twitter: www.twitter.com/FutureGamesShow
Facebook: www.facebook.com.GamesRadar
Twitch: www.twitch.tv/GamesRadar
